title: Got at (TEFC)
creator_credit: Patricia Edgar and Centre for Study of Educational Communication and Media
brief_description: Presents the attitudes of a group of women trainee teachers towards sex-role socialisation. Seeks to stimulate discussion about the role teachers and school organizations play in fostering, reinforcing or changing sex-role stereotyping in Australian society.
